CAREERS

Join Us! Search for your opportunities with us

RECRUITMENT SPECIALIST

Responsible of the design, management, and administration of recruiting and hiring, rime requirements and business objectives based on company strategy.

JOB DESCRIPTION

  1. Conduct candidate background check based on selection procedure and through all possible channel. This may include but not limited to check on reference reports, university transcript/certificate, family background, criminal record, etc.
  2. Provide analysis and recommendation of external parties in order to seek the best recruitment channel for vacant positions, e.g. executive search company, outsourcing company, campus recruitment, newspaper, job fair, etc.
  3. Ensure that all recruitment request are created using proper administrative documents (ex: ePRF; CPRF) and evaluate the incoming documents based on approved organization chart and or staff man power planning.

SUBMIT

REQUIREMENTS

  1. Min. Bachelor degree in any major, preferably in Psychology.
  2. Min. 2 (two) years experience in Human Resources, especially in the arrangement of recruitment and placement; Preferably from hospitality.
  3. Strong analytical thinking and attention to detail.
  4. Excellent communication skill with all levels and negotiation skill in recruiting process.
  5. Good leadership in recruiting process.
  6. Ability to maintain confidentiality of some Human Capital information/ documents.
  7. Able to conduct psychologycal testing and scoring.

RESPONSIBILITIES

  1. To evaluates different recruitment channels and sources and to propose new methods for improvement.
  2. Be responsible for the monitoring and improvement of the recruitment process in the organization.
  3. To provide effective and efficient recruitment processes and current recruitment knowledge and trends within the market overall.
  4. Receiving requests from the human resources department for new job availability.
  5. Creating job postings and putting them online.
  6. Browsing social networking sites like LinkedIn for suitable job profiles with required skills.
  7. Attending job fairs and other events and searching for talent.
  8. Communicating by phone, email, and in person with job candidates to figure out things like availability and hiring timelines.
  9. Performing other assessments of job candidates skills, such as by giving a written test or hiring for a trial period, etc.
  10. Reading resumes/CVs, job applications, and cover letters and creating a mental picture of the applicant.
  11. Judging applicants based on knowledge, skills, abilities, and other characteristics.
  12. Reaching out to a number of applicants large enough to guarantee a more than satisfactory hire after interviewing.
  13. Recruiting candidates within a preset timeframe for continued business productivity.
  14. Recruiting apprentices and trainees that have the potential to grow into skilled workers.
  15. Networking with industry professionals and employment agencies who may know suitable candidates.

    16. Please send your CV to: ambarsari@innagroup.co.id / 0812-2152-5239
